0.9.1.name: wordpress/bind-wp
0.9.1.description:
"BiND for WordPress theme converter" plug-in has the function which converts template files created by " BiND for WebLiFE 6" into WordPress Theme files.

"BiND for WordPress theme converter" has another function, we call it "BiND for WordPress DashBorad". "BiND for WordPress DashBorad" is customized Dashboard which assists users to use their WordPress.

Function List Convert BiND6 Template files into WordPress theme files Customized dashboard

The plug-in converts only a template created by " BiND for WebLiFE 6". About the use of this plug-in, the " BiND for WebLiFE 6" product support is not covered.
